attributes.action: Change the laws so criminals under 18 years old can face a whole life sentence
attributes.additional_details: In light of the  axel rudakubana Crime if fee these changes should be made
attributes.background: Remove the legislation that prevents criminals under the age of 18 not receiving whole life sentences.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715078
